article:
'Substrate' is a term used in converting process such as printing or coating as
a more general term to describe the base material onto which e.g. images will be
printed. Base materials include (though are not limited to):
* plastic films or foils,
* release liner
* textiles,
* fabrics,
* plastic containers
* any variety of paper (lightweight, heavyweight, coated, uncoated, paperboard,
  cardboard, etc.), or
* parchment.
